title: Making Music
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 46 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 150L
description: Have you ever played an instrument? From plucking harps to tapping boards, the book Making Music explores different ways music is made. Diverse, detailed photographs paired with high-frequency words and predictive text support early emergent readers. This book can be used to teach students how to visualize when reading as well as determine cause-and-effect relationships.
meta: board, drum, horn, pluck, rattle, strum
Cause and Effect : Determine cause and effect
Initial Sound : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency words a, can, you

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
